skills.title: React JS
skills.message: Ohh.. ReactJS! What an excellent tool to create interactive applications!
skills.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces, incredibly fast, and promotes declarative javascript coding and buildencapsulated components.

skills.title: Typescript
skills.message: Check it out! You might find something cool like the importance of Accessibility, SEO and how to make Semantic HTML!
skills.description: Eliminate potential bugs in development by precisely defining type annotations, securing strongly type action guards or defining a strict event handlers.

skills.title: Modern JS
skills.message: Check it out! You might find something cool like how to use Flexboxes and modern vendor prefixes!
skills.description: Technology is constantly evolving, so thus JavaScript. New standardized version of JavaScript introduces us a lot of features that are a response to best practices and ease of use.

skills.title: Redux
skills.message: Let me tell you something about Redux
skills.description: It is very difficult to reuse the components in React because it is tightly coupled with the root component. Redux reduces this complexity and provides global accessibility that helps to build applications that work frequently.

skills.title: CSS, CSS in JS
skills.message: Check it out! You might find something cool like how to use Flexboxes and modern vendor prefixes!
skills.description: We facilitate ourselves to write clean, easy and less CSS in a programming construct and gives us the capability to extend complex styles without writing heavy line of codes.

skills.title: Mobile Firest Design
skills.message: Check it out! You might find something cool like what is modern javascript programming nowadays!
skills.description: Mobile-first design is a key ingredient to successful product design, it promotes accessibility on any platforms our customers use and bringing in more conversions.

skills.title: Reusable Components
skills.message: Let me tell you something about Jest
skills.description: We promote consistency across the ecosystem and we make sure that user-experience will be same across all the products. Easy to maintain, can be used multiple times within the application.

skills.title: Component Documentation
skills.message: Let me tell you something about Git.
skills.description: Documentation helps you organize and deliver thoughts to stakeholders and your colleagues, which in turn helps them understand how our design decisions will satisfy the user needs and their own business objectives.

skills.title: CI / CD
skills.message: Let me tell you something about Git.
skills.description: Using CI tools, developers continually commit code in small increments, sometimes multiple times a day, which is then automatically built and tested before it is merged with the shared repository.

experiences.description: AECOM is an American multinational infrastructure consulting firm. AECOM has approximately 51,000 employees, and is number 157 on the 2019 Fortune 500 list. The company's official name from 1990 to 2015 was AECOM Technology Corporation, and is now AECOM.
tasks: Deliver a WCAG Accessibility standard websites.
experiences.message: Even though I stayed quite a short period, (due to Country relocation) it's been fun to work with the AECOM team!

experiences.description: Emerson Electric Co. is an American multinational corporation headquartered in Ferguson, Missouri. The Fortune 500 company manufactures products and provides engineering services for industrial, commercial, and consumer markets. Emerson's core values are Integrity, Safety & Quality, Support Our People, Customer Focus, Continuos Improvement, Collaboration & Innovation.
tasks: Deliver across the software development life cycle - analysis, design, build, test and deploy.
Work with the front-end development team to build the interface with focus on usability features.
experiences.message: Working with Emerson had me glued with their motto: Consider It Solved!

experiences.description: The SLI Consulting Management came together in 1987 to answer the demand for IT solutions in rise of the internet information age. We started the Philippine-based clients and eventually grew to include other clients from the Asia-Pacific Region and the United States. Through time we have been a trail blazer in innovation of I.T. training program such as TAP (Train Assist Program) that has been adopted in some of our client sites.
experiences.message: SLI is the first company to hire me as a Web Developer. I am very grateful to work with them.
achievements: Deployed as a contractual agent for Emerson Electric
tasks: Deliver across the software development life cycle - analysis, design, build, test and deploy.
Develop WordPress websites for Emerson Electric
Develop .Net websites for Emerson Electric (Monitoring technician tools)

experiences.description: Upwork Global Inc., formerly Elance-oDesk, is an American freelancing platform headquartered in Santa Clara and San Francisco, California. The company was formed in 2013 as Elance-oDesk, after the merger of Elance Inc. and oDesk Corp.
experiences.message: Freelancing is my starting point being a web developer! Work with a lot of different people and served them well!
achievements: 4.99 / 5 Star Rating out of 24 Completed Jobs
tasks: Develop project-based HTML5 & WordPress websites for many people
